sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This will update proper value for multiple_elements_view column in pa_widgets table.  to compute multiple_elements_view we need indicator aggregate type and widget type.</description> <name>Update aggregate type in widgets</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[SNC.PAMultiElementUtil.updateMultipleElementViewColumnInWidgets();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-14 06:18:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>329af7635fc03300ed3926e6ee73131f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update aggregate type in widgets</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">97a305876da620100acb70b353433004</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_329af7635fc03300ed3926e6ee73131f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-14 18:49:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
